CustomField.description: Based on the Date - Time in Last Digital / Print and XTend Transaction Dates in the last 12 Months
CustomField.formula: IF(AND( Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 , Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 , Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 ),'Digital, Print and Xtend',IF(AND( Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 , Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 , Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c)),'Digital and Print',IF(AND( Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 , Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c), Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 ) ,'Digital and Xtend',IF(AND( Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 , Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c), Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c) ) ,'Digital',if(AND( Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c), Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 , Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 ) ,'Print and Xtend',IF(AND( Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c), Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c), Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 ) ,'Xtend',if(AND( Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c), Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c), Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c)) ,'No Activity in Last 12 Months',if(AND( Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c) , Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c >= TODAY() - 365 , Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c<TODAY()-365 || ISBLANK(Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c)) ,'Print','No Activity in Last 12 Months')))))) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if customer has purchased Print, Digital and/or News Xtend in the past 12 months
CustomField.label: Customer Is
